scripts.ui:features:test: rm -rf src/ui/assets/allure-results-tms-test && rm -rf src/ui/assets/allure-report-tms-test && cross-env test_env=tms-test playwright test --config=./src/ui/config/playwright.config.ts
scripts.ui:features:test:report: allure generate src/ui/assets/allure-results-tms-test --clean -o src/ui/assets/allure-report-tms-test && allure open src/ui/assets/allure-report-tms-test
scripts.ui:features:prod: rm -rf src/ui/assets/allure-results-tms-features && rm -rf src/ui/assets/allure-report-tms-features && cross-env test_env=tms-features playwright test --config=./src/ui/config/playwright.config.ts
scripts.ui:features:prod:report: allure generate src/ui/assets/allure-results-tms-features --clean -o src/ui/assets/allure-report-tms-features && allure open src/ui/assets/allure-report-tms-features
